remarks: Lemma for ~ issiga and ~ isrnsiga The set of sigma algebra with base set ` o ` is a set.  Note: a more generic version with ` ( O e. _V -> ... ) ` could be useful for ~ sigaval .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Oct-2016.)
statement:
sigaex $p |- { s | ( s C_ ~P o /\ ( o e. s /\ A. x e. s ( o \ x ) e. s /\ A. x e. ~P s ( x ~<_ _om -> U. x e. s ) ) ) } e. _V $.
$d o s $.
